I didn't see the pictures, but I have a vague feeling it's supposed to
be reading Sanjo Kokaji Munechika, and as such will be gimei. 

Hopefully this was not bought in Ohio. Could you email me the pictures?

- darcy

<sparkshms@...> writes:

> Hello,
>    my name is Rob,im a new member.,Can someone help me with the name 
> on my sword? SANJYO KOKAJI MUNEIE.,This may not be right.,Thats all I 
> have to go on.What period is the sword smith? 
>    I put pictures in Rob S photos and two old tsuba pictures as well.
